metadata.title: MEYNG | AI That Matters
metadata.description: MEYNG builds AI-driven products that fight for accessibility — bridging gaps in language, education, food sustainability, and community development for underserved communities worldwide.
metadata.ogDescription: We build AI products that fight for accessibility — for those left behind.

hero.title: We build AI for
hero.description: We fight for accessibility. We build AI products that bridge gaps in language, education, sustainability, and community development — where access is limited and impact is greatest.

homeProducts.sectionDescription: Each product tackles a specific barrier that keeps communities from reaching their potential — powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence.

products.sectionDescription: From preserving endangered languages to reducing food waste, every product we build addresses a real barrier that keeps underserved communities from reaching their potential.

sangoai.description: Real-time translation, conversational AI, and interactive language learning for the Sango language — serving over 5 million speakers in the Central African Republic.

sangoaiFull.description: The first AI-powered language platform for Sango, the national language of the Central African Republic spoken by over 5 million people. SangoAI provides real-time translation, conversational AI chat, interactive language learning with quizzes and flashcards, and a developer API for third-party integrations.
features: AI chat assistant fluent in Sango
Interactive learning with quizzes and vocabulary

obetrack.description: A mobile app that uses AI to help households and businesses track fresh product inventories, predict expiry dates, and reduce food waste with smart notifications.

obetrackFull.description: A mobile application that leverages AI to help households, restaurants, and small businesses track and manage their fresh product inventories. Obêtrack uses intelligent expiry predictions and smart notifications to reduce food waste, save money, and promote sustainable consumption habits.
features: Recipe suggestions based on expiring items
Barcode scanning for quick product entry

endara.description: An AI-powered SMS learning platform designed for students without internet access. Quality education delivered through basic text messaging — no smartphone or data plan needed.
features: Works on any basic phone via SMS

endaraFull.description: An innovative SMS-based learning platform designed to bring quality education to students and learners who lack internet access. eNdara uses AI to personalize lesson delivery, adapt to student progress, and provide interactive assessments entirely through basic text messaging — no smartphone or data plan needed.
features: Works on any basic phone via SMS

connectz.description: A collaborative portal for NGOs and municipalities to manage projects, track outcomes, and improve impact reporting with AI-generated insights and automated analytics.

connectzFull.description: A collaborative portal designed for NGOs and municipalities to manage projects, track outcomes, and improve impact reporting. ConnectZ uses AI to aggregate data from multiple sources, generate automated reports, and provide actionable insights for better decision-making and donor engagement.

products.ctaTitle: Interested in partnering on a product?
products.ctaDescription: We are always looking for partners, collaborators, and organizations who share our vision of using AI to create real-world impact where it matters most.

api.label: Developer API
api.title: Built for developers
api.description: Integrate our AI capabilities directly into your applications. SangoAI's REST API gives you access to state-of-the-art translation and language processing — with simple, documented endpoints and predictable pricing.

values.sectionDescription: We don't just build technology. We build solutions for the people and communities that the tech industry overlooks.

aiFirst.title: AI-First
aiFirst.description: Every product we build harnesses artificial intelligence to solve real problems for people who are too often overlooked by technology.

accessibilityFirst.title: Accessibility-First
accessibilityFirst.description: We design for the hardest constraints first — no internet, no smartphone, no literacy. If it works there, it works everywhere.

impactDriven.title: Impact-Driven
impactDriven.description: We measure success not in downloads, but in barriers removed, communities empowered, and lives meaningfully improved.

cta.title: Ready to build something
cta.description: Whether you are a partner, investor, or organization fighting for accessibility — we would love to hear from you.

about.sectionDescription: We are an AI company dedicated to building products that bridge gaps in language, education, sustainability, and community development — for those left behind.
about.missionDescription: To harness the power of artificial intelligence to create accessible, impactful products that bridge gaps in language preservation, education access, food sustainability, and community development — wherever access is limited and impact is greatest. We believe AI should be a force for equity, not exclusion.
about.visionDescription: A future where every underserved community has access to AI-powered tools that enhance their daily lives — whether it is communicating in their native language, learning without internet access, reducing food waste, or managing community projects with data-driven insights.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We push the boundaries of what AI can achieve, especially for underserved markets and communities that traditional tech overlooks.

socialImpact.title: Social Impact
socialImpact.description: Technology must serve people. Every product we build is measured by its ability to create meaningful, positive change in real lives.

accessibility.title: Accessibility-First
accessibility.description: We design for the hardest constraints first — no internet, no smartphone, no literacy. If it works there, it works everywhere.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the power of collaboration. Our products are built with and for the communities they serve, not just about them.

founder.name: Michel Wen
founder.bio: Software engineer and entrepreneur passionate about using AI to solve real-world problems for underserved communities. Based in Paris, Michel founded MEYNG with a simple belief: AI should be a force for equity, not exclusion.

founded.title: MEYNG Founded
founded.description: Established with a mission to build AI products that fight for accessibility — for those left behind.

sangoaiLaunch.title: SangoAI Launched
sangoaiLaunch.description: First AI-powered language platform for Sango goes live, serving 5M+ speakers in the Central African Republic.

obetrackEndara.title: Obêtrack & eNdara
obetrackEndara.description: Development begins on food waste reduction and SMS-based education platforms — tackling sustainability and learning access.

expanding.title: Expanding Impact
expanding.description: ConnectZ in development. Pursuing grants and partnerships to scale globally and reach more underserved communities.

about.ctaDescription: We are looking for partners, investors, and talented individuals who share our passion for using AI to fight for accessibility and create meaningful, lasting impact.

contact.sectionDescription: Have a question, partnership idea, or want to learn more about what we're building? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.contactIntro: Whether you are an investor, partner, NGO, or simply curious about our work, reach out. We respond to every message.
contact.formSuccess: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.
contact.formError: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly at contact@meyng.com.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Let us help you find your way.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: MEYNG ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website meyng.com.
privacy.collectDescription: We may collect the following types of information:
collectItems: Contact information (name, email address) when you submit our contact form
Usage data such as pages visited, time on site, and referring URL via analytics tools
Technical information such as browser type, device type, and IP address
privacy.useDescription: We use the information we collect to:
useItems: Respond to your inquiries and messages
Communicate with you about our products and updates
privacy.sharingDescription: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website (e.g., Formspree for contact form processing, Vercel for hosting), subject to confidentiality agreements.
privacy.cookiesDescription: Our website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, though some features may not function properly.
privacy.securityDescription: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsDescription: Under applicable data protection laws (including GDPR), you have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@meyng.com.
privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@meyng.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms") carefully before using the website meyng.com operated by MEYNG ("we", "us", or "our").
terms.acceptanceDescription: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our website.
terms.useDescription: You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe on the rights of others or restrict their use of the site.
terms.ipDescription: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of MEYNG or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our prior written consent.
terms.productsDescription: Information about our products (SangoAI, Obêtrack, eNdara, ConnectZ) is provided for informational purposes. Product features, availability, and pricing are subject to change without notice.
terms.disclaimerDescription: This website is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of harmful components.
terms.liabilityDescription: To the maximum extent permitted by law, MEYNG shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of this website.
terms.governingDescription: These Terms are governed by the laws of France. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Paris, France.
terms.changesDescription: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at contact@meyng.com.

footer.description: Building AI-driven products that fight for accessibility — bridging gaps in language, education, food sustainability, and community development for those left behind.
